name: Black Bean Salsa Cups
description: These little bites are the perfect appetizer for your next gathering or fancy eats for a cozy movie night at home. Super easy to make, you’ll love the crunch of the chips, the creamy queso and beans, and the pop of tomato salsa!

ingredients.name: Ooey Gooey Queso Hot Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Drain and rinse beans. Dice tomato. Place in bowl with mix; stir to combine.  
  2. Arrange chips on a platter. Spoon bean mix over each chip. 
  3. Drizzle with queso prior to serving.
tips: Look for tortilla scoops in the chip section of your grocery store. They’re easier to fill and eat. Can’t find them? Sub in large tortilla chips.
